derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from German Pudel(hund), from Low German pud(d)eln 'splash in water' (the poodle being a water-dog)

entry.def: A poodle is a type of dog with thick curly hair.

means.word_mean: 1. an intelligent dog with a heavy curly solid-colored coat that is usually clipped; an old breed sometimes trained as sporting dogs or as performing dogs
